entities.name: kingsley shacklebolt
entities.description: Kingsley Shacklebolt is mentioned as speaking in a deep and calming voice.

entities.name: lupin
entities.description: Lupin is mentioned as giving the first signal to mount brooms.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is recognized by his ability to identify wand sparks and is eager to fly on his Firebolt.

entities.name: firebolt
entities.description: The Firebolt is Harry's broomstick that he is eager to ride again.

entities.name: privet drive
entities.description: Privet Drive is mentioned as the location where Harry is taking off from.

relationships.description: Lupin and Kingsley Shacklebolt are working together, with Lupin giving signals to start the flight.
